Test Name: Horseradish IgE (Armoracia rusticana/A. lapathifolia) specific antibody
Purpose: To detect and quantify horseradish-specific IgE antibodies for the assessment of allergic sensitization.
Container: Serum or plasma collection tube (e.g., serum separator or EDTA tube)
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Phadia ImmunoCAP) or microplate reader for ELISA
